## useLogin() function

Hook to securely login to a backend with the connected wallet. The backend authentication URL must be configured on the ThirdwebProvider.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function useLogin({ domain, redirectTo, onError }: LoginConfig): (options?: LoginOptions) => Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  { domain, redirectTo, onError } | [LoginConfig](./react.loginconfig.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

(options?: LoginOptions) =&gt; Promise&lt;void&gt;

- A function to invoke to login with the connected wallet.
